message: Please deploy to production. Recent changes include: (1) Interactive map widget for artist geography, (2) Band member origins map with all members, (3) Fullscreen map modal with hover popups, (4) Band info panel showing members/albums/Wikipedia, (5) Bidirectional hover highlighting between map/graph/sidebar, (6) Map auto-zoom to fit all markers. All commits pushed to main.
deploy_commits: 0206de6 Fix popup staying open when hovering over Wikipedia link
5241202 Enhance expanded map with hover popups and band info panel
47c6777 Add bidirectional hover sync between map and sidebar/graph
f3b73ff Highlight map markers when hovering over band members
3141731 Replace external map link with fullscreen modal
71e1b5e Fix map auto-zoom and add double-click to expand
b27f89b Fix map drag-and-drop error and add AI features to roadmap
